runs.comm: half-volley outside off at 127ks, Guptill welcomes Anwar with a handsome drive. Creamed past the covers for four
full and just a shade outside off, Guptill eases forward and drives it to the man at cover now
Anwar shortens his length outside off, jabbing punch to cover-point
length and outside off, KW has that extra second to play the shot late. Dabbed down to third man with soft hands
Guptill is in his zone. Pitched up on off, Guptill clears his front leg and lifts it over mid-off, one-bounce four
slower ball at 113ks outside off, Guptill picks it up, bends his knee, and launches it over cow corner. Guptill pings the roof of the Westpac Stadium
back of a length and angling away from over the wicket, tapped to point
full and keeps going away with the angle outside off, guided late down to third man
tap-and-run single to mid-off from Guptill. Well-judged one
back of a length, hint of away swing, as KW shuffles across and steers it to third man again
nice and full on middle, defensively bunted in front of mid-on
full on middle, Guptill backs away, manufactures room, and flays through the covers
drifts in full, pushed to mid-on for a single. Good urgency from NZ
and again! Fired on middle, tapped in front of mid-on. Malik is a touch deeper there
slides on off, driven smoothly to long-off
Guptill goes bang, again! This is another dart on the leg stump, Guptill goes low, and slog-sweeps over deep midwicket
Umar Akmal messes it up in the deep. Pushed through slog-swept away, Umar over ran the ball at deep midwicket, gives away a four
width outside off, slashed in the gap at backward point
full toss, angled away. KW shapes to drive, but can't lay bat on it. That should have been put away
Amir hurls another full toss, 146ks, pushed down to deepish mid-off
slower-ball bouncer, Guptill spots it and pulls firmly to deep midwicket
full on the stumps, tapped back to the bowler
length ball on off, blocked to cover
full and straight, KW whirls his wrists and flicks it away. Wahab was lazy, late to dive to his right at mid-on. KW gets his first four. Guptill already has five fours and two sixes
speared into the hips at 143ks, flicked backward of square leg for four. NZ race to 50
short on the leg stump, Guptill clears his front leg and hoicks it to deep midwicket
pitched further up on a fourth-stump line, defended
this is no serene dab to third man. Shorter and outside off, KW shuffles outside leg and slashes it down to third man
full and width outside off, Guptill lays into a drive, Shehzad throws himself to his left and smartly stops the ball
pitched up around off at 144ks, laced to point
full on off, flicked towards cow corner for a couple. Lovely running
KW steps out, Afridi hurls it at 96ks, quietly played back
hint of turn outside off, dabbed behind square on off
dragged shorter on off, stops a bit on Guptill. Chopped to cover
skiddy ball on middle, clipped to square leg

Afridi does break the stand and unfurls the star man pose. Legbreak slides on outside off, Guptill goes low for the slog sweep. He skies it off a top edge, Umar Akmal runs in from long-on, and catches it at the midwicket region, though he took his eyes off it at the last moment
full on middle, Anwar pulls pace off it. Worked through midwicket
low full toss outside off, crunched to deep cover
back of a length on middle and leg, knocked solidly down the ground
short on middle, controlled pull to deep midwicket

Superb, sharp work from Rizwan. Low full toss, which is flicked to short midwicket. Munro drifts out in search of a single. Rizwan's release was lightning quick from a side-on, low position. He nails the stumps down with a rocket over-arm throw. Rizwan had only one stump to aim at. He sets off on a celebratory run, leaps, and takes a high-five from Anwar
back of a length on middle, turned through midwicket
nudged to point
the batsman steps out, Afridi shortens his length, and pings the thigh pad
googly, turns in, kept out
tickled to short fine leg
arrowed outside off, Anderson plays back and chips it through mid-on. Googly, stopped on the new batsman
straying onto the pads, KW misses the flick
back of a length and wide outside off, bottom-edged cut to the left of the keeper
this one stops on the batsman, chipped over Anwar's head
juicy full toss, KW does not miss out this time. He whips it away to the midwicket boundary
KW moved away outside leg, this is dragged short and outside off. Chopped to cover
128ks cross-seam leg-breakish slower ball outside off, KW reaches forward, extends his hands, and lifts it over the covers
back of a length and outside off, slapped straight to backward point
shortish and down leg, helped away fine. Looked like an offspinner, that one
KW dances out, Afridi held this back. This sticks in the pitch and foils the attempted lofted hit. Chipped to where mid-off may have been
full and straight, clipped through midwicket
darted flat and fizzes off the surface to beat the batsman
tossed up on middle, KW stretches forward and slog-sweeps over midwicket. Clean strike
short and outside off, KW pulls and may have got a bottom-edge behind to the left of Sarfraz
full and sliding into the pads at 145ks, Anderson eases it to the fine leg boundary. Glanced away with ease
shorter and outside off, punched to the right of cover
bumper outside off at 140ks, Anderson sways away from the line of harm
back of a length and outside off, Anderson clubs it over midwicket with some authority
back of a length and around off, Anderson targets the leg side, ends up getting a leading edge wide of point

Williamson holes out to Malik at long-on! Full and outside off, slants away with the angle, KW shuffles across for the lofted hit. The bat twisted in his hands as he skews it off the lower part of the part
sliding across off from over the stumps, cut through backward point
short on middle, punched to long-on
short, skiddy ball again. Played back to the bowler
picked away off the pads through square leg
dug in short outside off, sits up, Anderson pummels a pull, beating deep midwicket to his left
leg-side wide, beats the keeper as well
Malik has lost the plot. He spears it short and way down leg
slid across off at 91ks, ample width, Taylor goes back and cracks a cut behind point
full and darted on middle, pushed back
slides on outside off, cut to sweeper cover
99ks, fired outside off, square-cut away for one
Anderson lashes it down to long-off
100ks, this ball, driven to long-off
flicked from a fourth-stump line to long-on now
attempted googly, full and just a shade outside off, muscled over long-on for a 103-metre six
tickled fine off the pads
full and drifts in on off and middle, clipped through midwicket

darted short and down leg, pulled behind square. Amir makes a diving save. Anderson had set off for a single, but dives full length and makes his way back to the crease. A flatter throw from Amir could have put the left-hander in trouble
loopier on middle, forward and pushed back to the bowler
full toss, hit to long-on
slides in, fizzes off the surface, takes the pad, dribbles behind square on off
flat and full, agricultural heave to long-on off the inside half
slogged from outside off to cow corner. No flight at all from Wasim
Anderson backs away, the bowler follows him with a full toss. Slapped to long-off
yorker at 105ks, dug back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, crashed past the diving cover fielder to long-off
Anderson steps outside leg, Amir chases him with a 144ks full ball, slogged to cow corner
length ball on middle and leg as Anderson shuffles outside leg. He loads up for a big hit. Does not middle it. But still flies over deep midwicket
Anderson backs away outside leg, this is bowled well outside off. Slashed down to third man. 27-ball fifty for Anderson
very full and outside off, drilled to long-off
full and angling away outside off, flash and a miss
full on middle, Anderson makes room and smears it to cover
Anderson backs away again, pitched up and outside off. Wahab can't nail the yorker. Carved away over point
Wahab nails the yorker now, right on the blockhole on the leg stump. Squeezed out. Wahab has overstepped
Elliott goes deep in the crease and moves away outside off, squeezes out this blockhole ball to the off side
Anderson steps away, makes room, and flays a full ball to cover
full toss outside off, sliced over the covers
full and on middle, Anderson backs away, and swings it over long-on. Anderson did not middle that. No problem
rank leg-stump full toss, which is slog-swept away behind square
darted outside off, muscled to wide long-off
pitched up and outside off, Elliott makes room outside leg and caresses it inside-out over the covers
near-yorker length ball, driven down the ground

Anderson shuffles outside leg and goes over the man at cover. There is a brief hesitation on the third run, is Elliott run-out? He's gone. Accurate throw from the deep. Sarfraz collects it and takes the bails off
hit to long-on for one
full and on middle, Ronchi swings. He does not middle it. Umar runs to his left and takes it at long-on
full and on middle, hacked to long on
bumper outside off, sails through to the keeper. Wide called
pretty full, squeezed to long-on
113ks, slower ball. Dragged to long-on
full and outside off, carved over short third man
Anderson backs away and slices over short third man again
length and outside off, slogged to long-on
full toss, Santner misses it, and takes it on the pad
full and outside off, smeared to wide long-off
Amir goes for a yorker, pushes it too full. Clipped to cow corner
full toss, clears his front leg and slogs it to deep midwicket on the bounce
